name: college-notice-board
description: A comprehensive MERN stack application for managing college notices with admin authentication and public viewing

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run frontend:build
scripts.setup:atlas: echo 'Make sure to update MONGODB_URI in backend/.env with your Atlas connection string' && npm run setup
scripts.deploy:local: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.render:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.render:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build

author: College Notice Board Team
